name: Wombats I
overview: Wombats I is a parody text-based adventure game for 8-bit Atari systems. The player inputs commands via VERB NOUN statements. The player enters a bizarre world consisting of strange beings, killer vegetables, dim-witted robots, suggestive statues, weird happenings, outrageous puns, and general absurdity. Set in the remains of a college campus, the player's goal is to gather nine treasures strewn about the campus, and return them to their starting location. The player is furthermore rewarded bonus points for completing specific tasks during their adventure.
